casebody.data:
Tonya M. PRICE.
v.
Robert CALDER, Jr. No. 162P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Randolph M. James, Winston-Salem, for Price, Tonya M. Patrick M. Mincey, Wilmington, for Calder, Robert (Jr.). Kara O. Gansmann, Wilmington, for Calder, Robert (Jr.).

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of May 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
